Hi

My name is RamÃ³n Heras. I’m an Software Engineer ðŸ‘¾ that loves solving complex problems, especially if as part of a motivated team ðŸ™Œ. Watching YouTube videos is my favorite entertainment, mainly gadget reviews and unboxings ðŸ¤™.
